Uses of Class
controllers.Controller

  • Packages that use Controller 
    Package Description
    controllers  

    • Uses of Controller in controllers

      Subclasses of Controller in controllers 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AvoidController
      This controller need to drive around an obstacle blocking the path.
      class  CalibrateController
      This controller calibrates the light sensors.
      class  DestinationController
      The controller that tries to follow the line to the destination.
      Fields in controllers declared as Controller 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Controller DestinationController.avoidController
      Object to the other controllers.
      private Controller DestinationController.calibrateController
      Object to the other controllers.
      private Controller Controller.caller
      the current caller object.
      Methods in controllers with parameters of type Controller 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Controller.switchToController(Controller caller)
      Pauses the caller and turns on the controller.
